alert.note: Alert for Barton; Ellsworth; Lincoln; Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 4:44AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lincoln, northern Ellsworth, southeastern Russell and northeastern Barton Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 443 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northeast of Hoisington, moving northeast at 80 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ellsworth, Wilson, Claflin, Kanopolis, Holyrood, Lucas, Sylvan Grove, Dorrance, Bunker Hill, Susank, Ellsworth Airport, Cheyenne Bottoms, Wilson State Park, Wilson Lake and Odin. This includes Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 191 and 223. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for central Kansas.
